biotools.summary: gutSMASH web server is an automated identification of primary metabolic gene clusters from the gut microbiota. It is an approach to functionally profile the human microbiome for specialized primary metabolic gene clusters.

bioschemas.name: gutSMASH
bioschemas.summary: gutSMASH web server is an automated identification of primary metabolic gene clusters from the gut microbiota. It is an approach to functionally profile the human microbiome for specialized primary metabolic gene clusters.
